subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Nissan the movie.

Is that what it comes down=C2=A0to?=C2=A0 Anyone that has a different opini=
on is censored?=C2=A0 

Do you think that helps discovery?

Keep throwing r=
ocks at me, personally.=C2=A0 You are now guilty of the very thing you hate=
 so much and accuse others of.

I am not here to hurt you, and if my questi=
ons bother you I am sorry.=C2=A0 I will say it one more time.=C2=A0 If this=
 is a religion, something that is faith based, above question, then I am so=
rry.=C2=A0 Best wishes and I will go away.

But if this is a Science that c=
an be controlled and studied, then we need to take a real hard look at the =
subject.=C2=A0 

Censoring people that have real questions is simply not ve=
ry proactive to your cause, even if you don't like what they have to say.

=
Shoot me down with facts, not wishful thinking and faith.=C2=A0 Don't be a =
Nazi and what you have preached against
=C2=A0"Nature is showing us only th=
e tail of the lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs to it even th=
ough, because of its large size, it cannot totally reveal itself all at onc=
e." 
-=E2=80=94 Albert Einstein 


"It is far better to grasp the universe =
as it really is than to persist in delusions, however satisfying and reassu=
ring."
--Carl Sagan


"There is no such thing as an insignificant detail. D=
on't just look 
for what you want to find."
-- Me LOL 




________________=
________________
From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
To: EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wed, June 2, 2010 10:59:17 AM
Subject: Re: [EVP-IT=
C] Re: Nissan the movie.

=C2=A0 
=C2=A0Okay, I put the mean and nasty back=
 on moderated, so she at least has some chance of responding. Personal atta=
cks will not be tolerated. 

=C2=A0Frank-S


On Wed, Jun 2, 2010 at 9:17 AM=
, draiga1 <blackwing@cox. net> wrote:

=C2=A0 
>Thank you, Frank. It's nice=
 to get back to our regularly scheduled programming. I am enjoying learning=
 about this field and like to feel it's a safe haven for those researching =
ghost box communication without being ridiculed in the process.
>
>~Draiga =

>
>
>--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, "purplespacefriend" <purplealiengirl=
@ ...> wrote:
>>
>> That person is no longer allowed ot contribute! I've ha=
d it with these nasty negative attacks when we present--at least to us--wha=
t seems to be evidence, and/or discuss various methods and techniques. Thes=
e "skeptics" accept no evidence and basically call anyone doing this resear=
ch either crazy or liars. They have no place on this group, this group is n=
ot about gettng accpetable evidence, or the "proof" that will play in some =
air head university, it's about exploring something that is real and demons=
tratable. I do think for myself and I don't need some duffus to tell me wha=
t is acceptable to think about.
>> 
>> F-S
>> 
>> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s .com, "Fiona Broome" <email@> wrote:
>> >
>> > Hi,
>> > 
>> > It seems to=
 me that simply being on this list and taking these discoveries seriously, =
we already ARE thinking for ourselves.
>> > 
>> > Seriously, why would anyo=
ne use/waste time on this subject (and this list) if he or she wanted the s=
afety of accepted, mainstream, dogmatic thinking? (Rhetorical question.)
>>=
 > 
>> > I understand that some people feel obliged to play "Devil's Advoca=
te" with new and extraordinary theories and R&D, but it seems to me that th=
e Devil has enough advocates, thank you.
>> > 
>> > Healthy skepticism is o=
ne thing. All I'm seeing here is compelling evidence supporting EVP/ITC, fo=
llowed by attempts to shout down the concepts.
>> > 
>> > It looks like you=
're attacking the messenger. I don't think this is the right forum for that=
... if any is. 
>> > 
>> > However, since I'm new to this Yahoo Group, mayb=
e I misunderstood what this group is about.
>> > 
>> > Bemused,
>> > Fiona
=
>> > 
>> > > On Tue, Jun 1, 2010 at 6:39 PM, Lizzie Broden <yahuli69@> wrot=
e:
>> > > 
>> > > >
>> > > >
>> > > > Damn those Skeptics for making me thi=
nk for myself!
>> > > >
>> > > > Life and the world (Might still be flat) w=
ould be a much better place if it
>> > > > wasn't for them!!!!
>> > > >
>> =
> > > Oh well, it is what it is Time will tell
>> >
>>
>
>
